gnat.filter.ner
Class GOFilter

java.lang.Object
  gnat.filter.ner.GOFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class GOFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

Adds GO code annotations to texts, loading each annotation from a relational database.
Recognized GO codes are stored in each Text's ContextModel, with the model type GeneContextModel.CONTEXTTYPE_GOCODES.

To perform online GO term recognition, run a RunGoDictionary filter.

The relational database is specified in the ISGNProperties entries dbUser, dbPass, dbAccessUrl, dbDriver. The name of the table stored in the entry "pubmedToGoCodeTable". Required fields in this table are 'pubmedId' and 'goCode'.

Author:
Conrad, Joerg
See Also:
RunGoDictionary

Constructor Detail

GOFilter

public GOFilter(java.lang.String dbURL,
                java.lang.String user,
                java.lang.String password)
Creates a new GOFilter by opening a connection to the specified database. The database can be specified via ISGNProperties, see entries for dbUser, dbPass, dbAccessUrl, and dbDriver.

Method Detail

dispose

public void dispose()
Releases the database connection. Call if this filter is not used anymore.

filter

public void filter(Context context,
                   TextRepository textRepository,
                   GeneRepository geneRepository)
Adds GO code annotations to texts. GO codes for PMIDs are looked up in a relational database.

Specified by:

annotateText

private void annotateText(Text text)
Annotates this text by looking up its PMID in a database and adding the GO codes for this PMID to the text's context model.
